DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess pigmentation trabecular meshwork patient treat least 2 year TRAVATAN compare patient without exposure ( less 1 month ) prostaglandin analogue ( PGA ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Pigmentation Trabecular Meshwork After Two Years Treatment With TRAVATAN 0.004 % Ophthalmic Solution
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis openangle glaucoma without pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion component ; Either two year dose Travatan , prior exposure ( less 1 month ) topical ocular prostaglandin ; Requires trabeculectomy ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Pseudoexfoliation pigment dispersion ; History chronic recurrent severe inflammatory eye disease ; History current ocular infection ocular inflammation within past 3 month either eye ; Greater one month less two year exposure TRAVATAN ; Pregnant , breastfeeding , use highly effective birth control ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
